name: Coal Mining
description: Companies engaged in the extraction and processing of coal, a fossil fuel used for electricity generation and industrial applications.

name: Iron Ore Mining
description: Organizations involved in the exploration, extraction, and processing of iron ore, a key ingredient in steel production.

name: Copper Mining
description: Companies that explore, extract, and process copper, a highly conductive metal used in electrical wiring, construction, and manufacturing.

name: Gold Mining
description: Firms engaged in the exploration, extraction, and processing of gold, a precious metal used in jewelry, coins, and electronics.

name: Oil and Gas Exploration
description: Companies involved in the search, discovery, and extraction of crude oil and natural gas, used as energy sources for transportation, heating, and power generation.

name: Oil Refining
description: Organizations that process crude oil into various petroleum products, such as gasoline, diesel fuel, jet fuel, and lubricants.

name: Renewable Energy
description: Companies focused on generating energy from natural, sustainable sources, including solar, wind, hydro, and geothermal power.

name: Mineral Processing
description: Firms that transform raw minerals into higher-value products, such as concentrates, metals, and industrial minerals.

name: Drilling and Well Services
description: Companies providing equipment, services, and expertise for drilling, completing, and maintaining oil and gas wells.

name: Mining Equipment and Services
description: Organizations that design, manufacture, and supply equipment, as well as provide maintenance and support services, for the mining industry.

name: Energy Storage
description: Companies developing and providing solutions for storing energy, including batteries, fuel cells, and other innovative technologies.

name: Energy Trading
description: Firms engaged in the buying, selling, and trading of energy commodities, such as oil, natural gas, and electricity.

name: Environmental Services
description: Companies providing services and solutions to minimize the environmental impact of mining and energy operations, including remediation, waste management, and sustainability consulting.

name: Geological Services
description: Organizations offering expertise and services in geology, including exploration, mapping, and resource estimation for the mining and energy industries.
